content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here is the solution in Julia:
```julia
function wrap_string(s::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(s, " ")
    result = ""
    line = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(line * " " * word) <= text_width
            push!(result, word)
            push!(line, word * " ")
        else
            push!(result, "\n")
            push!(result, line)
            line = word * " "
        end
    end
    
    result
end
```
Here is an example of usage:
```julia
s = "This is a test string with multiple words"
println(wrap_string(s))
```
The output would be:
```julia
"This is\na test\nstring\nwith\nmultiple\nwords"
```
